summary: Cleaned up Metalogic_v2 by removing 4 unnecessary theorems with sorries (closed_extend_closed, add_neg_causes_closure, tableau_complete, decide_complete) and 2 deprecated theorems (semantic_truth_implies_truth_at, main_weak_completeness_v2). Created Boneyard/DeprecatedCompleteness.lean to document deprecated approaches. Net sorry count in Metalogic_v2 reduced from 8 to 4.

artifacts.summary: Documentation of deprecated completeness theorems and why they were removed
Implementation summary with before/after sorry counts and verification results

next_steps: Review implementation summary and run tests. Consider proving the remaining optional sorry in decide_axiom_valid if time permits.
